scripts.dev: pnpm run build:api && pnpm run setup:dev && next dev
scripts.build: pnpm run build:api && next build && pnpm run copy:api
scripts.build:api: pnpm run clean:api && pnpm run typedoc
scripts.build:docs: pnpm run build:api && next build && pnpm run copy:api
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:api && pnpm run clean:dev
scripts.copy:api: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');if(fs.existsSync('dist/api')){const src='dist/api';const dest='out/typedoc';fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('API docs copied to out/typedoc');}else{console.log('No dist/api found, skipping copy');}"
scripts.setup:dev: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');if(fs.existsSync('dist/api')){const src='dist/api';const dest='public/typedoc';fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('API docs linked for development');}else{console.log('No dist/api found for development setup');}"
scripts.check: pnpm run check:api-parity && pnpm run check:doc-imports && pnpm run check:nav && pnpm run check:links && pnpm run check:examples && pnpm run check:api
scripts.preview: pnpm run build && pnpm run start
